I need a great big post-it note to slap onto my computer screen to remind me to check schedules!
 
"Sword of Doom" starts in about an hour on IFC (5:00a.m. PST), repeats again at 10:15a.m.PST and one last time on early Sunday morning at 3:00 a.m. PST.  Information on the film can be found at http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0060277/ .  For those new to the list, this film contains little tidbits concerning the formation of the Shinsengumi (look for Kondou & Serizawa at the tournament) and the ending is... wow!  A definite samurai classic, very much worth watching, directed by Okamoto Kihachi (director of two of my favorites, "Kill" and "Red Lion") and starring Mifune Toshiro and Nakadai Tatsuya.
 
phil (who promises to send a film update later today... maybe go back to listing films in the list homepage calendar)
